hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Neutral Transition via 3-Day Momentum Exhaustion at Key Levels
hypothesis_content.statement: During BULL regime, when BTC approaches key psychological levels ($90K, $95K, $100K) and shows 3-day momentum exhaustion (RSI(14) > 80 + declining daily closes + volume contraction to <0.8x average), this signals impending consolidation and transition to NEUTRAL regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Psychological levels act as natural profit-taking zones. Momentum exhaustion with volume decline suggests weakening buying pressure. Post-breakout consolidation typical before next leg or regime change.
entry_conditions: BTC within 3% of key psychological level ($90K/95K/100K)
RSI(14) > 80 for 2+ days with declining daily closes

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime shifts to NEUTRAL OR 3% gain from short entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC breaks above psychological level with >1.2x volume

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout continues with renewed volume, exhaustion pattern resolves bullishly.
